scenes.background: You, Monica, and Bob continue discussing celebration plans.
scenes.description: Bob crosses his arms and says, What about a mix of activities? A little bit of everything.

options.text: That sounds like a fair way to include everyone's preferences.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Bob's suggestion, showing good perception and empathy, but self-regulation and motivation were moderate.

options.text: A mix might be chaotic; let's stick to one idea.
options.analysis: You showed confidence in having a single plan, displaying good social skill, but empathy was lower.

options.text: We could try a mix, but it may be tough to organize.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the suggestion and proposed a cautious approach, showing good self-regulation, but perception and empathy were moderate.
